summary: A forensic psychiatrist decides to change work. Days before leaving, a case of 5 shot on a Copenhagen city bus might involve an old patient of his. Other murders follow. He can't stop before the case is solved.
cast: Laura Bach|Jakob Cedergren|Lars Mikkelsen|Simon Kvamm|Lars Ranthe|Lærke Winther|Frederik Meldal Nørgaard|Iben Dorner|Benjamin Brüel|Petrine Agger|Tine Miehe-Renard|Thomas Baldus|Signe Skov|Malin Elisabeth Rømer Brolin-Tani|Peter Pilegaard|Andreas Jessen|Caspar Fomsgaard|Micky Skeel Hansen|Tobias Hyttel|Sami Paludan Møller|Thomas Milton|Anders Valentinus Dam|Benjamin Boe Rasmussen|Irina Frankild|Ole Boisen|Klaus Hjuler|Simon Maach|Jacob Sebastian Malm|Johannes Sverrisson|Embla Egelund Simonsen|Christoph Bastrup|Martin Boserup|Sami Darr|Casper Jexlev Fomsgaard
title: Den som dræber - Fortidens skygge
